content.description: Start low on obvious hands and climb up. Dynamic finish.
content.location: 20-30 deer into the trees at Barrett stoddard boulders

content.description: My buddy called this V2, but it didn't feel that hard to me.  No crux moves, just avoid getting scared due to the height.
content.protection: Stacked pads if you're worried about falling, landing is good
content.location: When facing Straightforward/Sidewinder, turn about 150 degrees to climbers right, and it'll be a couple yards away.  Hard to miss it since it's so big.

climbs.name: Baby V
climbs.fa: Sit start, both feet in large crack on left rock. Hands on “straitforward” rock

content.description: Standing in front of “straitforward” find the smaller rock to the left. Sit start, with feet on the small rock (There’s a large crack at the base) and hands on large straitforward boulder. Top out at the V shape. It’s a quick climb only 6ft high, crux for me was a left leg knee bar.
content.location: Left edge of “Straitforward” boulder. Feet start on small rock to the left. Top off at V shape.
